Plans

Start with a free 14 day trial, upgrade or downgrade anytime. All plans include unlimited users.

Try for free

Developer

Includes these features:

  • Sync and publish to public GitHub repos

  • Unlimited collaborators

    Invite additional users free

  • API access

    Within limits

  • Whitelisted Jekyll plugins

    GitHub-approved plugins & themes

  • Community support

    Slack channel and docs

Personal

Everything in Developer, plus:

  • Sync and publish to private GitHub repos

  • Publish to Amazon S3, Rackspace, FTP

  • Preview your site online before publishing

  • Jekyll theme support NEW

    Use custom Gem-based themes

  • Basic support

    Email us your questions

Team

Everything in Personal, plus:

  • User roles

    Admin, Publisher, Writer

  • Unlimited pages

  • Increased file storage

  • Increased API limits

  • Third-party Jekyll plugins NEW

    Build sites with custom Ruby code

Business

Everything in Team, plus:

  • Increased build time limit for complex sites

  • Priority publishing

  • Priority support

    Move to the top of the queue

Questions

Whatâ€™s early-bird pricing?

To celebrate the launch of Siteleaf v2 and show appreciation to early adopters, weâ€™re offering a deal on our site plans. Sign up while we have early-bird pricing to lock in the price.

How do subscriptions work?

Each new site you create starts with a free 14 day trial on the Personal plan, no credit card required. At the end of your trial, youâ€™ll be prompted to select a plan. You can upgrade or downgrade at any time and your next monthâ€™s bill will be prorated. Sites are billed monthly.

Can I still use my legacy v1 plan?

Yes! You can create a v2 site using your legacy plan, grandfathered at its current price. Legacy plans are held to its original user and site limits, and do not include advanced features like third-party Jekyll plugins. You can upgrade to a v2 plan at any time from your siteâ€™s settings page and cancel your legacy plan from your account page. You can also add v2 sites on top of your legacy plan if you hit your limit.

How many users are included?

All v2 plans come with unlimited users. Invite clients, content editors, and collaborators at no extra cost. Upgrade to the Team (or higher) plan to take advantage of user roles for admins, publishers, and writers. For those on a legacy plan, user limits may apply (see your account page for details).

What are the page and storage limits?

Developer sites are limited to 100 MB and 100 pages, including posts and documents. Personal sites are limited to 500 MB and 500 pages. All other plans, including legacy plans, come with 1 GB of storage and unlimited pages.

Where can I host my site?

With v2, you can publish to Amazon S3, GitHub Pages, Rackspace Cloud Files, or any host that supports FTP or FTPS (Digital Ocean, Media Temple, Dreamhost, GoDaddy, etc). Unlike v1, we no longer offer built-in Siteleaf Hosting. We decided to focus our efforts on being the best CMS and let others be the best hosting company.

Have more questions?

No problem! Tweet @siteleaf, chat on Slack, or email us.
